title: When will GPS devices start to pick up traffic updates via FM signals in the Wilmington ares?  I see that for my Garmin Nuvi Device, that they maybe be in a testing mode cause I can receive traffic information for a short period of time, but later in the day cannot receive the signal.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Thanks for using MyReporter.com!  http://www.myreporter.com/?p=10636
